library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)

library(gganimate)

library(corrplot)

knitr::opts_chunk$set(
 echo = FALSE,
 fig.width = 7, 
 fig.height = 5,
 fig.asp = 0.6,
 out.width = "60%")
theme_set(theme_bw() + 
          theme(legend.position = "bottom",
                legend.title = element_blank(),
                plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5, size = 15),
                plot.subtitle = element_text(hjust = 0.5, size = 12)))
